data.text: We are planning to run a full schedule on Christmas Day and Boxing Day despite proposed industrial action by Unite. [13:03GMT 19DEC]

Our new route between Stansted and #Chambery launches today. Find out more https://t.co/d62czXeqqY https://t.co/oFRRIrlpzb
It's a foggy morning across London's airports & some flights are being affected. Please check your flight here: https://t.co/Md01pAPZDw
We aim to ensure our customers travel as planned so Christmas arrangements aren't ruined. We'll publish more details in the next 72 hours.
More info here https://t.co/YtljOgBvq4 [21:24 16 Dec 2016]

data.text: We are finalising contingency plans that will protect our flight schedules on Christmas Day and Boxing Day. [21:24 16 Dec 2016]

data.text: We are appalled that Unite proposes to disrupt customers’ travel plans on Christmas Day and Boxing Day. [21:22 16 Dec 2016]
